review: A comical twist on the traditional cookiecutter jumpscare thriller. This stands out to me among the rest as the rebel of the genre. Very great title, highly recommended!

helpful: 11 of 11 people (100%) found this review helpful
review: A childhood classic, this game sure is one of a kind in that it takes a slight understanding of business, economics, and strategy, in order to become victorious. Best reserved for those who had the privelage of playing this while it was current. I highly recommend it, however, it may be difficult to grasp unless you have played it once before or at least have a basic understanding of at least one game in the stronghold series.

review: Such a simple game. The most enjoyable horror game I have played. While playing its interesting how often the players desire changes from 'I want to catch something on camera' to 'I donâ€™t want to see any more paranormal events'. A dark room, loud sound, and higher graphic settings is the best way to play. It would be cool if there were more area to explore but I still recommend it.
A graphical remake of one of the greatest games ever released, this is a must have for anyone wanting to relive this gaming legend.
